sentence:
Ms. ALSOBROOKS. Madam President, I, too, want to thank Senators  Collins, Van Hollen, Warner, and Kaine. I am glad we can work together  in this bipartisan way to ensure fairness for the residents of  Washington, DC.

I rise today to speak for the over 700,000…

…Merkley      Murphy      Murray      Ossoff      Padilla      Peters      Reed      Rosen      Sanders      Schatz      Schiff      Schumer      Shaheen      Smith      Van Hollen      Warner      Warnock      Warren      Welch      Whitehouse      Wyden                               NOT VOTING--3       Justice      Lummis      Slotkin
